name: Harry Potter Wiki
description: Built fully functional and styled CRUD application, storing and accessing information on MongoDB with Mongoose
Implemented the Bootstrap Framework to supplement CSS, increasing responsiveness to mobile platform
Experienced the importance of abstraction when having to go back an refactor hardcoded areas and debugging

name: Personal Library
description: Incorporated AJax to become familiar with the basis of making a request to allow a better understanding of the modern Fetch API
Implemented jQuery to manipulate DOM understanding how to integrate legacy code into modern libraries and frameworks

name: Weather Lookup
description: Implemented mobile responsiveness with the Grid system in conjunction with Flexbox
Utilizes Promise method to query weather api and parse JSON

name: Pet Simulator
description: Built the foundation of a responsive web game with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to ensure a functional and usable user experience
Implemented asynchronous function setInterval which provided insights into the concept of threads
